detectors.description:
ICO.finneyToWei(uint256) () performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- _finney * (1000000000000000000 / 1000) ()
detectors.markdown:
[ICO.finneyToWei(uint256)]() performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [_finney * (1000000000000000000 / 1000)]()

detectors.description: Erc20TokensContract () has incorrect ERC20 function interface:Erc20TokensContract.transfer(address,uint256) ()

ICO.buyTokens(uint256,uint256) () uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- currentBalance == erc20TokensContract.balanceOf(this) ()
detectors.markdown:
[ICO.buyTokens(uint256,uint256)]() uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [currentBalance == erc20TokensContract.balanceOf(this)]()

detectors.description:
ICO.setErc20TokensContract(address)._erc20TokensContractAddress () lacks a zero-check on :
		- erc20TokensContractAddress = _erc20TokensContractAddress ()

ICO.changeOwner(address)._newOwner () lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = _newOwner ()

Reentrancy in ICO.buyTokens(uint256,uint256) ():
	External calls:
	- currentBalance = erc20TokensContract.balanceOf(this) ()
	- erc20TokensContract.transfer(msg.sender,_quantity) ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- deals[dealsNumber] = (_priceToBuyInFinney,_quantity,block.number,block.timestamp) ()
	- dealsNumber = dealsNumber + 1 ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [ICO.buyTokens(uint256,uint256)]():
	External calls:
	- [currentBalance = erc20TokensContract.balanceOf(this)]()
	- [erc20TokensContract.transfer(msg.sender,_quantity)]()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [deals[dealsNumber] = (_priceToBuyInFinney,_quantity,block.number,block.timestamp)]()
	- [dealsNumber = dealsNumber + 1]()
